definition.name: Prettier Action
definition.description: Automatically runs prettier on all your changes.
definition.author: Conrad Großer <grosserconrad@gmail.com>

inputs.name: commit_message
inputs.description: Commit message, will be ignored if used with same_commit

inputs.name: commit_description
inputs.description: Extended commit message, will be ignored if used with same_commit

inputs.name: same_commit
inputs.description: Update the current commit instead of creating a new one

inputs.name: file_pattern
inputs.description: File pattern used for `git add`, can't be used with only_changed or only_changed_pr!

inputs.name: dry
inputs.description: Running the script in dry mode just shows whether there are files that should be prettified or not

inputs.name: no_commit
inputs.description: Can be used to avoid committing the changes (can be combined with dry mode, useful when another workflow steps commits after this commit anyways)

inputs.name: prettier_version
inputs.description: Specific version of prettier (by default just use the latest version)

inputs.name: working_directory
inputs.description: Specify a directory to cd into before installing prettier and running it

inputs.name: only_changed
inputs.description: Only prettify files changed in the last commit, can't be used with file_pattern!

inputs.name: only_changed_pr
inputs.description: Only prettify files changed in the current PR.  If specified with only_changed, only_changed will take precedent. Can't be used with file_pattern!

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: GitHub Token or PAT token used to authenticate against a repository

inputs.name: clean_node_folder
inputs.description: Remove the node_modules folder before committing changes

inputs.name: git_identity
inputs.description: Which identity is used for git name/email when committing changes. Needs to be one of "actions" or "author".

inputs.name: allow_other_plugins
inputs.description: Allow other plugins to be installed. By default, we are checking if the plugins are actually prettier plugins.
